first-launch.name: First Launch
first-launch.howToUnlock: Complete any lesson in the course to earn this achievement. It's your first step in the Capacitor journey!

speed-runner.name: Speed Runner
speed-runner.description: Complete a module in less than 1 hour
speed-runner.howToUnlock: Complete all lessons, the quiz, and the mini-game of Module 1 in less than 60 minutes.

perfect-score.name: Perfect Score
perfect-score.howToUnlock: Answer all questions correctly on any quiz. Demonstrate your mastery of the topic!

on-fire.name: On Fire
on-fire.howToUnlock: Study for 3 consecutive days. Consistency is key to learning.

module-master.name: Module Master
module-master.howToUnlock: Complete all lessons, pass the quiz, and finish the mini-game of Module 1: Setup + Fundamentals.

capacitor-king.name: Capacitor King
capacitor-king.howToUnlock: Complete all 4 course modules with all their lessons, quizzes, and mini-games. You'll become a Capacitor expert!

quiz-genius.name: Quiz Genius
quiz-genius.howToUnlock: Get a perfect score on 5 different quizzes. Study well before each assessment.

gamer.name: Gamer
gamer.howToUnlock: Complete all 4 mini-games: Command Builder, Plugin Matcher, Build Pipeline, and Store Reviewer.
